page.title: 10Employment
page.content: Altogether there are 180 people employed in the rectangle. The Gliding Strip employs 1 pilot with 1 self-employed maintenance engineer. The rest of the work is by volunteers. Burnroot sawmill employs 5 in its office and 30 in labour. The Balnacoil Hotel employs 14 - 5 in its kitchen and dining duties, 5 in room service, 2 in office and 2 in the bar. The Schools and Community Centre is the biggest employer with 72 teachers, 4 janitors, 13 meals staff and 16 cleaners. The Community aspect adds 7 admin Staff. A further 9 are employed working as farmers, foresters, a keeper and an antique restorer.
